required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Safety and Effective Study of Ginkgolides Diterpene Lactone Meglumine Injection in the Treatment of Ischemic Stroke.
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized,Double Blind,Placebo Parallel Controlled,Multicenter Clinical Sthdy of Ginkgo Diterpene Lactone Meglumine Injection for Acute Ischemic Stroke Efficacy Safety.

lead_sponsor.agency: Ministry of Science and Technology of the People´s Republic of China

collaborator.agency: Beijing Bionovo Medicine Development Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Ministry of Science and Technology of the People´s Republic of China

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to evaluate the safety and effectivity of Ginkgo diterpene lactone meglumine injection tn the treatment of acute ischemic stroke

detailed_description.textblock: After randomized to 90 + 7 days mRS 0-1 points is the Primary Outcome Measure,evaluate the safety and effectivity of Ginkgo diterpene lactone meglumine injection tn the treatment of acute ischemic stroke

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients with Modified Rankin Scale (mRS) less than or equal to 1 .

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients with National Institutes of Health Stroke Score (NIHSS) rising 4 or more points, three points, two points, one of the subjects changes from baseline to randomized 7 days.
Proportion of patients with National Institutes of Health Stroke Score (NIHSS) reducing 4 points or more changes from baseline to randomized 7 days,14 days.
Proportion of patients with Modified Rankin Scale (mRS) reaching 0-2 .
The Montreal Cognitive Assessment (MoCA) scale changes from baseline to randomized 14 days,90 days.
The EuroQol-5 Dimensions (EQ-5D) scale changes from baseline to randomized 14 days,90 days.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Ginkgo diterpene lactone meglumine injection simulation
arm_group.description: Ginkgo diterpene lactone meglumine injection simulation

intervention.description: 5 ml,oral,5 ml/times, 1 time/day.Before use, the drug slowly added to the 0.9% sodium chloride injection diluted in 250 ml, slow intravenous drip.

intervention.intervention_name: Ginkgo diterpene lactone meglumine injection simulation
intervention.description: 5 ml,oral,5 ml/times, 1 time/day.Before use, the drug slowly added to the 0.9% sodium chloride injection diluted in 250 ml, slow intravenous drip.
intervention.arm_group_label: Ginkgo diterpene lactone meglumine injection simulation

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Ministry of Science and Technology of the People´s Republic of China
